overview: Assistant Production Designer Wilson Na√±awa is tasked to look for a Last Supper to use as a prop for a TV commercial.  He finds three, but loses the one owned by Gareth Pugeda.  What happens next changes Wilson forever as he spends the next two years entangled in bureaucracy and red tape facing estafa and serious physical injury charges.  How will this ordinary man fare against a system he knows nothing about?  Will justice prevail for Wilson? Or will he be imprisoned for the loss of Last Supper No. 3?
title: Last Supper No. 3
